item.description: Pigeon Arabia This website is developed with ReactJS. I developed multiple responsive web pages. This was one of the complicated websites I help developed because of its UI design. Pigeon Arabia is a company that offers top brand in mother and baby products. The e-commerce website displays the company products for consumers to view and […]
item.content:encoded:
Pigeon Arabia

This website is developed with ReactJS. I developed multiple responsive web pages. This was one of the complicated websites I help developed because of its UI design.

Pigeon Arabia is a company that offers top brand in mother and baby products. The e-commerce website displays the company products for consumers to view and order.

The website can be viewed here.

item.title: Mic Robotics
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: Mic Robotics This website is developed with ReactJS. I developed multiple responsive web pages. Images were provided by the client. Mic Robotics is a company that provides robotic solutions in the UAE. The company website has a sleek, clean, and modern design to display company products. This website can be viewed here.
item.content:encoded:
Mic Robotics

This website is developed with ReactJS. I developed multiple responsive web pages. Images were provided by the client.

Mic Robotics is a company that provides robotic solutions in the UAE. The company website has a sleek, clean, and modern design to display company products.

This website can be viewed here.

item.title: Dafoos
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: Dafoos This website is developed with ReactJS. One of the first ReactJS websites I partook during my internship as a web developer. I developed multiple responsive pages and even did the scrolling function when clicking one of the navigation menus. Dafoos provides fire and security safety services and solutions. The website provides a clear and […]
item.content:encoded:
Dafoos

This website is developed with ReactJS. One of the first ReactJS websites I partook during my internship as a web developer. I developed multiple responsive pages and even did the scrolling function when clicking one of the navigation menus.

Dafoos provides fire and security safety services and solutions. The website provides a clear and detailed information about the company and its solutions and services.

The website can be viewed here.

item.title: Bizibee Uniforms
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: Bizibee Uniforms This website is developed with Magento. My responsibility was to input around 150 products (descriptions, images, and data) in the website database. This was a 2-year pending project, and I was a prominent member for my role in ensuring that the website was deployed during my time as a web developer intern. Bizibee […]
item.content:encoded:
Bizibee Uniforms

This website is developed with Magento. My responsibility was to input around 150 products (descriptions, images, and data) in the website database. This was a 2-year pending project, and I was a prominent member for my role in ensuring that the website was deployed during my time as a web developer intern.

Bizibee Uniforms is a company for manufacturing and supplying uniforms in the UAE. The company website has around 150 products, each having different variations.

The website can be viewed here.

item.title: Nurj Bridal
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: Nurj Bridal This website is developed with WordPress through Elementor. I was part of this project from the beginning. I developed multiple responsive web pages that can be viewed in various devices. Nurj Bridal is a boutique for selling exquisite wedding gowns. The company website shows the wedding gown collections created by Nurj Bridal. The […]
item.content:encoded:
Nurj Bridal

This website is developed with WordPress through Elementor. I was part of this project from the beginning. I developed multiple responsive web pages that can be viewed in various devices.

Nurj Bridal is a boutique for selling exquisite wedding gowns. The company website shows the wedding gown collections created by Nurj Bridal. The images were all provided by the client.

The website can be viewed here.

item.title: Wellness
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: Wellness This website is developed with WordPress through WPBakery builder. This was one of the first three websites that I worked on during my internship as a web developer. I developed multiple responsive web pages. I worked on this website as well as two other related projects simultaneously. Wellness is a medical facility that provides […]
item.content:encoded:
Wellness

This website is developed with WordPress through WPBakery builder. This was one of the first three websites that I worked on during my internship as a web developer. I developed multiple responsive web pages. I worked on this website as well as two other related projects simultaneously.

Wellness is a medical facility that provides various specialized medical services. The company website provides detailed information for consumers to view and understand. I was unfamiliar with using WPBakery builder, but I quickly adapted to the tool.

The website can be viewed here.

item.title: ACPN
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: ACPN This website is developed with WordPress through Elementor. This was one of the first three websites that I worked on during my internship as a web developer. I was involved in this project from its beginning stages. I developed multiple responsive web pages. I worked on this website along with two other related projects […]
item.content:encoded:
ACPN

This website is developed with WordPress through Elementor. This was one of the first three websites that I worked on during my internship as a web developer. I was involved in this project from its beginning stages. I developed multiple responsive web pages. I worked on this website along with two other related projects simultaneously.

ACPN (American Center for Psychiatry and Neurology) is a medical facility focusing on psychiatry and neurology. I worked alongside both the development team and creative team to create ACPN’s website. Not only did I develop the website using WordPress, I was also responsible for selecting appropriate image assets to convey information for consumers.

The website can be viewed here.

item.title: Maudsley Health
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: Maudsley Health This website is developed with WordPress through Elementor. Maudsley Health was one of the first three websites that I worked on during my internship as a web developer. I developed multiple responsive web pages. I worked on this website along with two other related projects simultaneously. Maudsley Health is a psychiatric institution. It […]
item.content:encoded:
Maudsley Health

This website is developed with WordPress through Elementor. Maudsley Health was one of the first three websites that I worked on during my internship as a web developer. I developed multiple responsive web pages. I worked on this website along with two other related projects simultaneously.

Maudsley Health is a psychiatric institution. It is one of the three hospital websites I developed using WordPress. I worked with both the development team and creative team to develop this website. Not only was I responsible for developing the website, I was also responsible for searching appropriate image assets to display and convey information.

The website can be viewed here.

item.title: 25 + 5 Clock
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: 25 + 5 Clock This project is a 25 + 5 clock (also known as the Pomodero Technique) developed using ReactJS. The project displays my ability to handle React states and understand Javascript logic and functions. Bootstrap and Sass are used to design the 25 + 5 Clock. The 25 + 5 clock is a […]
item.content:encoded:
25 + 5 Clock

This project is a 25 + 5 clock (also known as the Pomodero Technique) developed using ReactJS. The project displays my ability to handle React states and understand Javascript logic and functions. Bootstrap and Sass are used to design the 25 + 5 Clock.

The 25 + 5 clock is a web application to mimic the pomodero technique, which is a time management method of doing 25-minute continued work followed by a 5-minute break. After doing four consecutive intervals, a long break of at least 15 minutes is needed. Each work session is called a pomodoro, which is Italian for tomato.

The project can be viewed here.

item.title: Drum Machine
item.dc:creator: crimsonedge98
item.description: Drum Machine This project is a drum machine developed in ReactJS. This displays my understanding of React components, props, and lifecycles. Bootstrap and Sass are used to design the Drum Machine. The Drum Machine is a web application that imitates the sounds of a drum kit. The Drum Machine that I developed does not provide […]
item.content:encoded:
Drum Machine

This project is a drum machine developed in ReactJS. This displays my understanding of React components, props, and lifecycles. Bootstrap and Sass are used to design the Drum Machine.

The Drum Machine is a web application that imitates the sounds of a drum kit. The Drum Machine that I developed does not provide sounds of the drum. Instead, it provides sounds of the piano.

The project can be viewed here.
